title: Relief Fragment of a Man
description:
Small limestone flake with head of a man holding his hand to his face in low relief. He appears to be holding an unidentified object to his mouth.  
Condition: Traces of red paint on the face and hand, surface somewhat weathered.
credit_line: Gift of the Egypt Exploration Society

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
